sketch.compiler.stencilSK

Class FunctionalizeStencils

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.compiler.ast.core.FEReplacer
      • sketch.compiler.stencilSK.FunctionalizeStencils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEVisitor

    public class FunctionalizeStencils
extends FEReplacer
    This function directs the process of reducing the stencils down to finite functions. All the actual work is done by ProcessStencil. To use it, first visit the functions that you want to process. If you visit the functions one at a time, instead of the whole program, superParams won't be populated. Visiting the program produces ArrFunction objects for each variable, but then you have to call processFuns to actually make function objects out of these.
    Author:
    asolar

        public java.lang.Object visitPackage(Package spec)
        Description copied from class: FEReplacer
        StreamSpec represents a namespace. spec.getVars() will get you all the global variable declarations. spec.getStructs() gets you the structure declarations. spec.getFuncs() gets you all the function declarations.
        Specified by:
